title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. KK, pt. 9740 - The Fair Hearing Process
content:

State Regulations
§ 9740.1 - Introduction
§ 9740.2 - Notice of hearing

§ 9740.4 - Withdrawal or abandonment of a request for hearing
§ 9740.5 - Hearing officer
§ 9740.6 - Who may be present at hearing
§ 9740.7 - Fair hearing procedures

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. KK, pt. 9740

Statutory authority: Executive Law, art. 19-K, §

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
